entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Prince Albert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:55 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -14.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Albert Airport 09:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -14.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: W 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 05 January 2023
